metadata.title: (ON HOLD) Certification Training & Exam (ABAIv1) - UiPath Specialized AI Professional
metadata.description:
The purpose of the UiPath Specialized AI Professional training is to equip individuals with the necessary AI skills and knowledge to design end-to-end automation solutions using the UiPath platform. This training focuses on imparting expertise in understanding AI requirements in RPA, identifying automation opportunities, designing scalable and efficient automation solutions, and ensuring successful implementation and maintenance of UiPath robots within an organization.

**07/07 -** Put to on-hold status due the mission on the client

- Meet the components of the UiPath Platform – Automate (50h)
- Pre-Training Survey - Automation AI Professional
- Implementation Methodology Deep Dive (7h)
- Practice 
- Introduction (8h)
- Tutorials (4h)
- Meet the components of the UiPath Platform – Operate (8h)
